title: Having big pc problems on 3v3! HELP!
body: Im here for the last time i have posted about this problem 2 times haven't got any help whatsoever HERE it is - so i log into the client and i can play 2 games with no lag so just after i get into the 3rd game i get literally 3 fps for 2-5 mins after every 10 minutes or so sometimes it is like 15-17 and next games also my normal fps is 40-60 only happens in 3v3 and 5v5 is totally fine also happens in rotating gamemodes 3v3 style (like the 3v3 gamemode whatever it was) i tried the fps fix guide and also factory reset my pc im out of ideas , also i noticed the change that if i play like 3 games of 5v5 meanwhile before doing any 3v3 games i get the lag on the first or second game right away PLS NOTICE ME AND HELP! IT HAS BEEN 5 MONTHS I HAVEN'T GOT ANY HELP! New season is beginning i cannot play at all im really stressed

replies.body: Hey there, it really sucks to hear that this is still happening even after all this time.  Since you've tried all of these steps, your best bet may be to reach out to the tech team so they can get more context and find more options for you.  This is best down by downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to collect logs.  Attach these logs to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll get back to you as soon as we can!
